company_description: Zopa is a peer-to-peer lending platform that connects borrowers with investors, offering personal loans and investment opportunities with competitive rates and streamlined processes.
founders: Dave Nicholson, Giles Andrews, James Alexander, Richard Duvall, Tim Parlett
embedding_text: Zopa is a peer-to-peer lending platform that connects borrowers with investors, offering personal loans and investment opportunities with competitive rates and streamlined processes.
